mapper.select: SELECT sm.menu_id,sm.parent_id,(SELECT `name` FROM sys_menu WHERE menu_id=sm.parent_id) as parent_name, sm.name,sm.icon,sm.type,sm.url,sm.perms,sm.order_num,sm.layer,sm.create_time,sm.update_time FROM sys_menu sm WHERE sm.parent_id = 0 ORDER BY sm.order_num

SELECT sm.menu_id,sm.parent_id,(SELECT `name` FROM sys_menu WHERE menu_id=sm.parent_id) as parent_name, sm.name,sm.icon,sm.type,sm.url,sm.perms,sm.order_num,sm.layer,sm.create_time,sm.update_time FROM sys_menu sm WHERE sm.parent_id = #{navMenuId} ORDER BY sm.order_num

SELECT sm.menu_id,sm.parent_id,(SELECT `name` FROM sys_menu WHERE menu_id=sm.parent_id) as parent_name, sm.name,sm.icon,sm.type,sm.url,sm.perms,sm.order_num,sm.layer,sm.create_time,sm.update_time FROM sys_menu sm, sys_role_menu srm, sys_user_role sur WHERE sur.role_id = srm.role_id AND srm.menu_id = sm.menu_id AND sur.user_id = #{userId} AND sm.parent_id = 0 ORDER BY sm.order_num

SELECT sm.menu_id,sm.parent_id,(SELECT `name` FROM sys_menu WHERE menu_id=sm.parent_id) as parent_name, sm.name,sm.icon,sm.type,sm.url,sm.perms,sm.order_num,sm.layer,sm.create_time,sm.update_time FROM sys_menu sm, sys_role_menu srm, sys_user_role sur WHERE sur.role_id = srm.role_id AND srm.menu_id = sm.menu_id AND sur.user_id = #{userId} AND sm.parent_id = #{navMenuId} ORDER BY sm.order_num
SELECT layer+1 FROM sys_menu WHERE menu_id=#{parentId}
